channel.title: (trisidiax source) HOW TO: edit the achivement tab
channel.description:
ok in my server there is a SHORTCUT to the achievement tab on the quest tab
i want to know how do you edit it so you can type stuff on it like server info and other things
plz tell me how tro edit achievement tabs. been looking everywhere

item.title: (trisidiax source) HOW TO: edit the achivement tab
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:12, topic:471772”][quote author=RSPS MAKER Carlos link=topic=589428.msg4175875#msg4175875 date=1355002193]
To: arham
quote from lim:
Arham it doesnt show the line.

same for me. plz man help? or someone?

if you help (im not rich in runescape, id give a couple 1k or 2k or some partyhats.)
[/quote]
Don’t play RS. That’s why I make 317s loading 319 cache.

First of all, is there anything written in your achievement diary? If so, try using the search bar in the folder. In the search, you type the text in the achievement bar.

However, if there is no text, then in Client.java find

//Achievement Tab

If it finds nothing, put this in process():

//Achievement Tab getPA().sendFrame126("", 29295); getPA().sendFrame126("", 29296); getPA().sendFrame126("", 29297); getPA().sendFrame126("", 29298); getPA().sendFrame126("", 29299); getPA().sendFrame126("", 29300); getPA().sendFrame126("", 29301); getPA().sendFrame126("", 29302); getPA().sendFrame126("", 29303); getPA().sendFrame126("", 29304); getPA().sendFrame126("", 29305); getPA().sendFrame126("", 29306); getPA().sendFrame126("", 29307); getPA().sendFrame126("", 29308); getPA().sendFrame126("", 29309); getPA().sendFrame126("", 29310); getPA().sendFrame126("", 29311); getPA().sendFrame126("", 29312);

Between the “” type your text. Test out which ones which.

However, if nothing happens when you change the text, instead of the code I provided you, use:

getPA().sendFrame126("", 39155); getPA().sendFrame126("", 39161); getPA().sendFrame126("", 39162); getPA().sendFrame126("", 39163); getPA().sendFrame126("", 39164); getPA().sendFrame126("", 39165); getPA().sendFrame126("", 39167); [/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: (trisidiax source) HOW TO: edit the achivement tab

item.source: (trisidiax source) HOW TO: edit the achivement tab

item.title: (trisidiax source) HOW TO: edit the achivement tab
item.dc:creator: @Jaxi Jaxi
item.description:
@Jaxi wrote:

Client.java and Search for and search for

getPA().sendFrame126("Total Level: "+totallevelz+"", 7127);

Under that paste this and change them to what you want.

getPA().sendFrame126("Quest Points: " + needle + "", 29295); if (needle == 6) getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Needle in the Haystack", 29297); else if (needle < 6) getPA().sendFrame126("@red@Needle in the Haystack", 29297); if (error == 6) getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@The Error", 29298); else if (error < 6) getPA().sendFrame126("@red@The Error", 29298); if (condemned == 6) getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Condemned", 29299); else if (condemned < 6) getPA().sendFrame126("@red@Condemned", 29299); if (shadow == 6) getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@The Shadow", 29300); else if (shadow < 6) getPA().sendFrame126("@red@The Shadow", 29300); if (legends == 6) getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@League of Legends", 29301); else if (legends < 6) getPA().sendFrame126("@red@League of Legends", 29301); if (creator == 6) getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@The Creator", 29302); else if (creator < 6) getPA().sendFrame126("@red@The Creator", 29302); if (troll == 6) getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@My little Troll", 29303); else if (troll < 6) getPA().sendFrame126("@red@My little Troll", 29303); }

Read full topic

item.title: (trisidiax source) HOW TO: edit the achivement tab
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

If it doesn’t already include the interface ID line in the upper left hand corner of the client, go into RSInterface.java and search for something that is on the interface. You will find all of the IDs on the interface there. I’m trying to dumb it down so that you can understand it.

Read full topic

@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“RSPS MAKER Carlos, post:9, topic:471772”]To: arham
quote from lim:

same for me. plz man help? or someone?

if you help (im not rich in runescape, id give a couple 1k or 2k or some partyhats.):/[/quote]
Don’t play RS. That’s why I make 317s loading 319 cache.

First of all, is there anything written in your achievement diary? If so, try using the search bar in the folder. In the search, you type the text in the achievement bar.

However, if there is no text, then in Client.java find

//Achievement Tab

If it finds nothing, put this in process():

//Achievement Tab getPA().sendFrame126("", 29295); getPA().sendFrame126("", 29296); getPA().sendFrame126("", 29297); getPA().sendFrame126("", 29298); getPA().sendFrame126("", 29299); getPA().sendFrame126("", 29300); getPA().sendFrame126("", 29301); getPA().sendFrame126("", 29302); getPA().sendFrame126("", 29303); getPA().sendFrame126("", 29304); getPA().sendFrame126("", 29305); getPA().sendFrame126("", 29306); getPA().sendFrame126("", 29307); getPA().sendFrame126("", 29308); getPA().sendFrame126("", 29309); getPA().sendFrame126("", 29310); getPA().sendFrame126("", 29311); getPA().sendFrame126("", 29312);

Between the “” type your text. Test out which ones which.

However, if nothing happens when you change the text, instead of the code I provided you, use:

getPA().sendFrame126("", 39155);
               getPA().sendFrame126("", 39161);

Second, I recommend a new source.
third. This can actually be done client sided…
